choices: Follow a human's point of view. (Titans together).
Follow a human's point of view. (Titans separated).
1.content:
Kyra and Quarion finally reached Earth. They were standing on a vast field.
Kyra was a beautiful woman. She had short black hair and amber eyes. Quarion was a well-built man. He had black hair and brown eyes. They were both wearing greek-style white clothes. She was wearing a sleeveless short robe, golden bracelets, a golden diadem and a pair of leather sandals. He was wearing no shirt, a pair of shorts and a pair of leather sandals. He was 60 ft tall, while she was 57 ft tall.
Now, standing there, they were thinking about what to do.
1.title: Titans' arrival

12.content: They both decided to separate. Kyra walked to a small town she found while exploring. As she entered all the people started running in panic. She looked down as all the people scattered by her feet. She then noticed...
12.title: Kyra's welcome

choices: She decides to cause some disaster.
She decides to look for someone.
122.content:
She waited, looking at them until they were in front of her massive feet.
"Surrender, titan", she heard one of them shouting, "or you will recieve no mercy".
She bent down. "Then give me all you've got", she said.
They run to her feet with their spears in high. She slowly moved her hand in front of them and flicked the first ones with her finger. These ones made the ones behind fall, until they were all lying on the ground. She then picked up one of them with her index and thumb by his leg and lifted him to eye level.
"Hi, little one", she said, "enjoying the view?".
As she said this, she felt a little picket on her foot. She looked down to see a soldier piercing her foot with a spear. She barely felt the weapon's attack. She lifted her foot and crushed him with it. Then, she threw the guy she was holding away, until he was no longer on view. She then grabed the remainding ones with her gigantic hand. "Bye-bye", she said, dropping them. As they fell, she kicked them with her huge foot and sent them flying.
"That should be a warning", she thought.
122.title: Vanquishing the army

123.content: "Mommy!Where are you?"The litte boy cries.She abandoned him because of Kyra and Quarion entered the city.Kyra stared down at him felling sorry for him.What does she do?
123.title: Pitiful human

choices: Two lions were reliesed into the arena.
124.content:
She looked at the colosseum, and decided to go and have fun. She stepped over the walls and standed in the center of the arena. All the people in the croud started running in all directions.
"Stay where you are!", her voice boomed, "Don't you want to see the spectacle?. Come on, who will be the brave warrior that will beat me?"
All the people stared petrified. Then, a gladiator, armed with a sword, came into the arena. She looked at him, as he nervously walked to her. She bent down and with her index and thumb took the sword away from him. He then, started running back to the door he came from. She swiftly lifted her foot and crushed him with it.
"Someone else?", she asked.
124.title: Colosseum

1241.content:
The Gate at the far end of the Titaness opened with a loud noise. slowly five big and bulky build men, armored and armed with different kind of weapons.

Kyra threw her head back and started laughing. "Is that all? Five Strong Warriors against me lonely women? Wait a second. I'll give you some support.

With that she turned around and scooped up the screaming observers. "Here guys. For you!" As she said that she dropped all the people on the five warriors. She created a pile of about 80 bodys.

"So, are you ready now? Good, cause here I come." She placed her foot ontop of the bodypile and pressed down. "You worthless mortals" She pressed down completly and placed her other foot also on the bodies. She contienued to trample on the crushed bodies until the sand was just a red mud. "This was like stomping grapes", she smiled. Then she realised that the colloseum was empty. The observers fled in terror. "That was not really fun after all. What can I do next in this mortal world?"
1241.title: The 'fight'

choices: a young woman sleeping under a tree's shadow.
13.content: He looked around, trying to find something. As he walked, sometimes stepping over a tree, he saw
13.title: Through the field

131.content:
He sees a village near him and starts to walk quietly toward it. Some of the people see him and start to run away but 5 people stay there because they hadn't noticed him. He saw that 3 of them, who was men, were beating up the 2 other men with metal sticks. The sticks weren't sharp but they would kill the 2 men if Quarion doesn't do something. He approach and take the man that looked like the chief and lift him up to his brown eyes. ''Why are you doing this to these men? Being 3 with weapons against 2 without weapons is really coward.
- We... we..., he start, we were just playing with them right guys?
- No that not true. They wanted to kill us and we don't even know them.
- Really? If that's it...''

As he say that, he lift the man over his head, open his mouth and let the man fall inside. He could hear him scream in terror as he swallowed him whole. The two others ran away in fear, but got catched in Quarion giant hand. He swallowed them whole too and burped. He was now watching the two injured men. ''Are you alright?
- I'm fine but i think my friend have a broken leg.
- I can fix this.'' He took him in his hand, close his fist and
131.title: Humans are so bad sometimes

choices: Quarion and the men set out for the lost sister
Quarion decides to just forget about the men and kill them anyway
1311.content:
Quarion held the man in his hand and pondered what to do. He could, in fact, heal the man which would be most beneficial to the hurt man. But he didn't want to do it quite yet. Quarion wanted to know what these humans were doing and what their lives were like before he helped them in anyway.

" What, may I ask, is the initial reason for those men that I ate hurting you two?" Quarion said.

" We told you, we don't know," that one on the ground said back.

" You are a liar, tell me what they were after," Quarion said, " Otherwise your friend here doesn't get healed."

The guy on the ground looked up at the one in Quarion's hand and finally gave in. He explained the reasoning for the three men attacking them was due to their own accord. The two mean kidnapped the three men's sister, then used her for their own pleasure. Quarion was mortified by this. He inquired where the woman was at. The man on the ground said she was held captive in a cave miles away where no one would find her.

" This is just horrible, I swallowed three men because they were taking revenge on you two," Quarion said, " Now they suffer for it... Not if I can help it."

Quarion closed his fist with the man and his broken leg. He squeezed tightly and crushed him to death, then dropped him in front of the man on the ground. Before the man could even run, Quarion raised his giant sandal over the villager and crushed him on the spot. The man laid crushed in the giant foot print of Quarion.

Knowing there wasn't much time, Quarion grabbed a tree and shoved it down his throat trying to trigger his gag reflex. Suddenly Quarion fell to the ground and vomited the contents of his stomach which were the three men. They fell out of his mouth to the ground. They were all covered in his stomach acid. Two seemed to be alright but the other one looked dead.

" I am so sorry for my misunderstanding. I took care of the men who took your sister. They lay on the ground," Quarion said pointing to the two bodies.

They looked at the man crushed in Quarion's hand, then the one crushed by his sole. They turned back to Quarion and voiced their disgust for the death of their brother. Quarion apologized for his behavior and made sure to help find their sister before he moved on. They agreed in return for his behavior.

Before they set off Quarion bent down and grabbed the three dead men, then disposed of them in his mouth so no one would have to clean up the mess...
1311.title: He crushes him to death

132.content: He approached to her quietly. He then touched her with his massive finger. She woke up, and as soon as she looked at him, she standed up and started running. He quickly interposed his palm so she could run no more. She looked back at him, horrified, as she put her arms in front of her, trying to protect herself. He grabed her with his massive hand and dropped her in his other hand's palm. He then...
132.title: Little lady

choices: scolded him for his way of satisfying his boredom
disapproved, telling him kindly of such wrong doings
1321.content:
'I would not hurt a beautiful creature like yourself,'
She really was beautiful, maybe even more so than Aphrodite. She began to calm herself, a blush forming on her cheeks,
'Oh, um...Th-Thank you,' she said timidly.
Quarion introduced himself, gazing into her emerald green eyes, then asked for her name,
'I-I am Phirea,' she was still very nervous, 'I-I live with my little sister in the nearby village,'
Quarion looked to where she pointed, then back down at her. She asked what a titan like himself was doing on Earth and he answered truthfully. Phirea gasped and...
1321.title: Phirea

13212.content:
'You mustn't relieve yourself of mere boredom in the expense of others,' she told him, 'No, no. It is horrible,'
And as wise as Athena, Quarion thought. His great heart pounded within his chest as he looked deeper and deeper into her kindly eyes, which were now filled with concern and worry. He nodded, taking in her words,
'You are right, Phirea,' he said, 'I must not do such a thing,'
Phirea smiled in relief and at his change of mind. She never thought that she would be talking to a titan let alone acting like his conscience,
'I am glad that you agree, Quarion,'
She noticed the dreamy expression on his face and saw that he was staring directly at her...
13212.title: Good Conscience

135.content: A little girl came running toward him, followed by a gang of rough looking boys who seemed much older than her. They were chasing her, holding up sticks and ready to beat her. He watched them first, standing his ground. Then, the weeping girl tripped over her little blue robe. With the boys right only just a few metres behind her, they would surely kill her...
135.title: The Girl

choices: He tells her he just wants to talk
1351.content:
The titan stopped the approaching gang, slamming a massive foot down in front of them. The boys in front flew back into the ones behind them and they stared up at his towering form in fear,
'Leave the girl alone,' he growled, 'Or I will satisfy my hunger with your lives,'
With that, the boys ran off screaming and crying until they hid themselves in a forest. Quarion stepped back and reached for the fallen girl. She gasped and she backed away from his approaching hand. Quarion gently curled his fingers behind her and lifted her up, holding her up closer to his face. Tears rushed down her little cheeks as she looked into the pitch black darkness that were his eyes.
1351.title: To her Aid

info.brief_description: A couple of titans go to Earth to cause troubles.
info.description:
This story takes place in an ancient Greek city. Kyra and Quarion are two titans who, bored, decided to go to Earth and have fun causing trouble.

- No weight gaining.
- No sex stuff.

Other than that, have fun.
